question.text: Which of the following has been recently used for increasing the productivity of super milk cows?

options.text: Artificial insemination by a pedigree bull only
Superovulation of a high production cow only
A combination of superovulation, artificial insemination and embryo transplantation into a carrier cow (surrogate mother).

solution.text: For increasing productivity of super milk cows, a combination of superovulation (production of exceptional numbers of ova at one time), artificial insemination(In this method, semen is collected from superior male and injected into the reproductive tract of selected female) and embryo transplantation into a carrier cow is done.
